In this transferred post, the attributional style has been changed from global to specific. The original post mentioned "all my worries" and "finally feel free," indicating a global attributional style that attributes the cause of stress to various aspects of life. In contrast, the transferred post focuses on the specific cause of daily worries and the desire to leave them behind during the adventure, indicating a specific attributional style.
